VASSAL.tools.image

Interface ImageTypeConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FallbackImageTypeConverter, FileImageTypeConverter, MemoryImageTypeConverter

    public interface ImageTypeConverter
    An interface for converting BufferedImages from one type to another.
    Since:
    3.2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage convert(Reference<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> ref, int type)
      Converts an image to the given type.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage convert(Reference<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> ref,
                                     int type)
                              throws ImageIOException
        Converts an image to the given type.
        Parameters:
        ref - a holder for the image
        type - the type of image to return
        Returns:
        a converted image
        Throws:
        ImageIOException - if something goes wrong
